subject: Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
College Football Playoff National Championship
lead_paragraph: The kick was a classic underdog maneuver, a gamble from a program that is seemingly always favored and from a coach, Nick Saban, who used never to make such moves.
snippet: The kick was a classic underdog maneuver, a gamble from a program that is seemingly always favored and from a coach, Nick Saban, who used never to make such moves.
